Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/95th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via 95th,King Drive, 103rd and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

Allow extra travel time.
